flawed_nl_solution:
When Trevor is 11, his older brother will be 11 x 3 = <<11*3=33>>33 years old.
Trevor’s older brother is 20 - 11 = <<20-11=13>>13 years older than Trevor.
Since Trevor is 13 years younger, Trevor will be 33 - 13 = <<33-13=20>>20 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 9, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
